protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the first reaction in the catabolism of the essential branched chain amino acids leucine, isoleucine, and valine.

go_class.description: cellular amino acid and derivative metabolic process
branched chain family amino acid metabolic process
G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle

reference.reference_text: Schuldiner O, Eden A, Ben-Yosef T, Yanuka O, Simchen G, Benvenisty N: ECA39, a conserved gene regulated by c-Myc in mice, is involved in G1/S cell cycle regulation in yeast. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1996 Jul 9;93(14):7143-8.
